TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ResourceReader extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable, class System.Resources.IResourceReader
Public NotInheritable Class ResourceReader Implements IResourceReader
public ref class ResourceReader sealed : System::Resources::IResourceReader
type ResourceReader = class interface IResourceReader interface IEnumerable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 通过读取顺序资源名称/值对枚举二进制资源 (.resources) 文件的资源。

span.span: Enumerates the resources in a binary resources (.resources) file by reading sequential resource name/value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 类提供的标准实现接口。The class provides a standard implementation of the interface. 一个实例表示独立.resources 文件或程序集内嵌入的.resources 文件。A instance represents either a standalone .resources file or a .resources file that is embedded in an assembly. 它用于枚举.resources 文件中的资源并检索其名称/值对。It is used to enumerate the resources in a .resources file and retrieve its name/value pairs. 它不同于类，该类用于从程序集内嵌入的.resources 文件中检索指定已命名的资源。It differs from the class, which is used to retrieve specified named resources from a .resources file that is embedded in an assembly. 类用于检索的资源名称事先已知的而类可用于检索的资源在编译时不知道其数量或确切名称。The class is used to retrieve resources whose names are known in advance, whereas the class is useful for retrieving resources whose number or precise names are not known at compile time. 例如，应用程序可能使用的资源文件存储到的分区和其中的部分中的项或部分数事先不知道的一节中的项进行组织的配置信息。For example, an application may use a resources file to store configuration information that is organized into sections and items in a section, where the number of sections or items in a section is not known in advance. 然后可以以一般方式命名的资源 (如`Section1`， `Section1Item1`， `Section1Item2`，依次类推) 并通过使用检索对象。Resources can then be named generically (such as `Section1`, `Section1Item1`, `Section1Item2`, and so on) and retrieved by using a object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 详细了解使用类，请参阅以下各节：For more information about using the class, see the following sections: - [实例化 ResourceReader 对象Instantiating a ResourceReader object](#instantiate) - [枚举 ResourceReader 对象的资源Enumerating a ResourceReader object's resources](#enumerate) - [使用 IDictionaryEnumerator 属性来检索资源Retrieving resources by using IDictionaryEnumerator properties](#idictionaryenumerator) - [通过名称和 GetResourceData 检索资源Retrieving resources by name with GetResourceData](#getresourcedata) ## 实例化 ResourceReader 对象Instantiating a ResourceReader Object .Resources 文件是从文本文件或 XML.resx 文件的已编译的二进制文件[Resgen.exe （资源文件生成器）](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md)。A .resources file is a binary file that has been compiled from either a text file or an XML .resx file by [Resgen.exe (Resource File Generator)](~/docs/framework/tools/resgen-exe-resource-file-generator.md). 一个对象可以表示独立.resources 文件或嵌入在程序集中的.resources 文件。A object can represent either a standalone .resources file or a .resources file that has been embedded in an assembly. 若要实例化对象读取的独立.resources 文件，使用类构造函数的输入的流或包含的.resources 文件的名称的字符串。To instantiate a object that reads from a standalone .resources file, use the class constructor with either an input stream or a string that contains the .resources file name. 下面的示例说明了这两种方法。The following example illustrates both approaches. 第一个实例化对象，表示名为的.resources 文件`Resources1.resources`使用文件名称。The first instantiates a object that represents a .resources file named `Resources1.resources` by using its file name. 第二个实例化对象，表示名为的.resources 文件`Resources2.resources`使用从文件创建一个流。The second instantiates a object that represents a .resources file named `Resources2.resources` by using a stream created from the file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/ctor1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/ctor1.vb#2)] 若要创建对象，表示一个嵌入的.resources 文件，该对象实例化从在其中嵌入.resources 文件的程序集的对象。To create a object that represents an embedded .resources file, instantiate an object from the assembly in which the .resources file is embedded. 其方法将返回对象，可传递给构造函数。Its method returns a object that can be passed to the constructor. 下面的示例实例化对象，表示嵌入的.resources 文件。The following example instantiates a object that represents an embedded .resources file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/ctor1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/ctor1.vb#3)] ## 枚举 ResourceReader 对象的资源Enumerating a ResourceReader Object's Resources 若要枚举的.resources 文件中的资源，请调用方法，它返回对象。To enumerate the resources in a .resources file, you call the method, which returns an object. 在调用`IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext`方法将从一个资源移到下一步。You call the `IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext` method to move from one resource to the next. 该方法将返回`false`.resources 文件中的所有资源已在被都枚举。The method returns `false` when all the resources in the .resources file have been enumerated. > [!NOTE] > 尽管类实现接口并方法，方法不提供实现。Although the class implements the interface and the method, the method does not provide the implementation. 相反，方法将返回提供对每个资源的名称/值对的访问接口对象。Instead, the method returns an interface object that provides access to each resource's name/value pair. 您可以检索通过两种方式在集合中的单个资源：You can retrieve the individual resources in the collection in two ways: - 您可以循环访问的每个资源收集和使用要检索的资源名称和值的属性。You can iterate each resource in the collection and use properties to retrieve the resource name and value. 当所有资源都是相同的类型，或者您知道每个资源的数据类型时，我们建议此方法。We recommend this technique when all the resources are of the same type, or you know the data type of each resource. - 可以检索每个资源的名称，当循环访问集合并调用方法来检索资源的数据。You can retrieve the name of each resource when you iterate the collection and call the method to retrieve the resource's data. 我们建议这种方法不知道每个资源的数据类型时，或如果前一种方法将引发异常。We recommend this approach when you do not know the data type of each resource or if the previous approach throws exceptions. ### 使用 IDictionaryEnumerator 属性来检索资源Retrieving Resources by Using IDictionaryEnumerator Properties 枚举的.resources 文件中的资源的第一种方法涉及到直接检索每个资源的名称/值对。The first method of enumerating the resources in a .resources file involves directly retrieving each resource's name/value pair. 调用后`IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext`方法将移动到集合中每个资源可以检索资源名属性和资源数据从属性。After you call the `IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext` method to move to each resource in the collection, you can retrieve the resource name from the property and the resource data from the property. 下面的示例演示如何通过使用检索的名称和值的.resources 文件中的每个资源和属性。The following example shows how to retrieve the name and value of each resource in a .resources file by using the and properties. 若要运行该示例，创建名为 ApplicationResources.txt 定义字符串资源的以下文本文件。To run the example, create the following text file named ApplicationResources.txt to define string resources. ``` Title="Contact Information" Label1="First Name:" Label2="Middle Name:" Label3="Last Name:" Label4="SSN:" Label5="Street Address:" Label6="City:" Label7="State:" Label8="Zip Code:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Business Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" Label12="Other Phone:" Label13="Fax:" Label14="Email Address:" Label15="Alternate Email Address:" ``` 然后可以将文本资源文件转换为二进制文件使用以下命令来命名 ApplicationResources.resources:You can then convert the text resource file to a binary file named ApplicationResources.resources by using the following command: **resgen ApplicationResources.txt****resgen ApplicationResources.txt** 下面的示例然后使用类来枚举独立二进制.resources 文件中的每个资源，并显示其密钥名称和相应的值。The following example then uses the class to enumerate each resource in the standalone binary .resources file and to display its key name and corresponding value. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/class1.vb#1)] 尝试检索资源数据从属性可能会引发以下异常：The attempt to retrieve resource data from the property can throw the following exceptions: - 一个如果数据未采用预期格式。A if the data is not in the expected format. - 一个如果找不到包含数据所属的类型的程序集。A if the assembly that contains the type to which the data belongs cannot be found. - 一个数据所属的类型不能为如果找不到。A if the type to which the data belongs cannot be cannot be found. 通常情况下，将引发这些异常，该程序集是否早于较旧版本的.resources 文件已经过手动修改，如果定义了一个类型的程序集已包括与应用程序，或者已被意外删除或者一种类型。Typically, these exceptions are thrown if the .resources file has been modified manually, if the assembly in which a type is defined has either not been included with an application or has been inadvertently deleted, or if the assembly is an older version that predates a type. 如果引发一个异常，则可以通过枚举每个资源和调用来检索资源方法，如以下部分所示。If one of these exceptions is thrown, you can retrieve resources by enumerating each resource and calling the method, as the following section shows. 此方法提供了有关数据的一些信息与您键入的尝试返回的属性。This approach provides you with some information about the data type that the property attempted to return. ### 通过名称和 GetResourceData 检索资源Retrieving Resources by Name with GetResourceData 枚举资源的.resources 文件中的第二个方法还涉及到通过调用文件中的资源中导航`IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext`方法。The second approach to enumerating resources in a .resources file also involves navigating through the resources in the file by calling the `IDictionaryEnumerator.MoveNext` method. 对于每个资源，检索该资源的名称从属性，然后传递给方法来检索资源的数据。For each resource, you retrieve the resource's name from the property, which is then passed to the method to retrieve the resource's data. 此参数作为字节数组返回`resourceData`参数。This is returned as a byte array in the `resourceData` argument. 这种方法是比检索的资源名称和值从更加棘手和属性，因为它返回窗体中的资源值的实际字节数。This approach is more awkward than retrieving the resource name and value from the and properties, because it returns the actual bytes that form the resource value. 但是，如果要检索其资源的尝试会引发异常，方法可以帮助确定异常的源通过提供有关资源的数据类型的信息。However, if the attempt to retrieve the resource throws an exception, the method can help identify the source of the exception by supplying information about the resource's data type. 指示资源的数据类型的字符串的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the string that indicates the resource's data type, see . 下面的示例演示如何使用这种方法来检索资源，并处理引发的任何异常。The following example illustrates how to use this approach to retrieve resources and to handle any exceptions that are thrown. 它以编程方式创建一个包含四个字符串、 一个布尔值、 一个整数，一个位图和一个自定义的二进制.resources 文件`DateTimeTZI`对象。It programmatically creates a binary .resources file that contains four strings, one Boolean, one integer, one bitmap, and one custom `DateTimeTZI` object. 若要运行该示例，请执行以下操作：To run the example, do the following: 1. 创建名为 Library.dll 包含程序集`DateTimeTZI`结构。Create an assembly named Library.dll that contains the `DateTimeTZI` structure. 下面是该程序集的源代码。The following is the source code for the assembly. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/library.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/library.vb#4)] 通过使用以下命令编译 C# 中的源代码：Compile the source code in C# by using the following command: ``` csc /t:library library.cs ``` 或者，可以通过使用以下命令而在 Visual Basic 中编译：Or, you can compile it in Visual Basic by using the following command: ``` vbc library.vb /t:library ``` 2. 编译并执行以下源代码，这会创建一个名为 ContactResources.resources 的.resources 文件。Compile and execute the following source code, which creates a .resources file named ContactResources.resources. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/createresourceex1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/createresourceex1.vb#5)] 源代码文件是名为 CreateResources.cs。The source code file is named CreateResources.cs. 您可以编译它在 C# 中使用以下命令：You can compile it in C# by using the following command: ``` csc CreateResources.cs /r:library.dll ``` 或者，可以通过使用以下命令而在 Visual Basic 中编译：Or, you can compile it in Visual Basic by using the following command: ``` vbc CreateResources.vb /r:library.dll ``` 3. 编译并运行以下代码以枚举 ContactResources.resources 文件中的资源。Compile and run the following code to enumerate the resources in the ContactResources.resources file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/cs/readresourceex1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.class/vb/readresourceex1.vb#6)] 之后修改的源代码 (例如，通过故意引发的末尾`try`块) 或重命名 Library.dll 程序集，以便在运行时不可用，可以运行示例，查看如何调用使您能够检索或重新创建某些资源的信息。After modifying the source code (for example, by deliberately throwing a at the end of the `try` block) or renaming the Library.dll assembly so that it is unavailable at runtime, you can run the example to see how calls to enable you to retrieve or recreate some resource information.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 用于读取资源的输入流。

span.span: The input stream for reading resources.

summary.span: 为指定的流初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for the specified stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数实例化对象中检索的资源，它是从独立.resources 文件或从.resources 文件嵌入程序集中。The constructor instantiates a object that retrieves resources either from a standalone .resources file or from a .resources file that is embedded in an assembly. 若要从独立.resources 文件中读取，实例化对象，并将其传递给构造函数。To read from a standalone .resources file, instantiate a object and pass it to the constructor. 若要从嵌入的.resources 文件中读取，调用具有区分大小写名称的.resources 文件，并返回的传递方法对象传递给构造函数。To read from an embedded .resources file, call the method with the case-sensitive name of the .resources file, and pass the returned object to the constructor. [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-instance-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-instance-note.md)] ## Examples 本部分中的示例使用以下名为的.txt 文件`PatientForm.txt`来定义应用程序使用的资源。The example in this section uses the following .txt file named `PatientForm.txt` to define the resources used by an application. ``` Title="Top Pet Animal Clinic" Label1="Patient Number:" Label2="Pet Name:" Label3="Species:" Label4="Breed:" Label5="Date of Birth:" Label6="Age:" Label7="Owner:" Label8="Address:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Work Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" ``` 您可以通过发出以下命令将.txt 文件编译到.resources 文件：You can compile the .txt file into a .resources file by issuing the following command: **resgen PatientForm.txt****resgen PatientForm.txt** 下面的示例假定的资源文件嵌入程序集包含应用程序的可执行代码。The following example assumes that the resource file is embedded in the assembly that contains the application's executable code. 它将检索名为的资源文件`PatientForm.resources`从当前正在执行的程序集，并显示名称和每个资源的值。It retrieves a resource file named `PatientForm.resources` from the currently executing assemblies and displays the name and value of each of its resources. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/cs/stream1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/vb/stream1.vb#1)] 如果名为 C# 示例`Example.cs`，可以使用以下命令编译它：If the C# example is named `Example.cs`, you can compile it by using the following command: **csc Example.cs /res:PatientForm.resources****csc Example.cs /res:PatientForm.resources** 如果名为 Visual Basic 示例`Example.vb`，可以使用以下命令编译它：If the Visual Basic example is named `Example.vb`, you can compile it by using the following command: **vbc Example.vb /res:PatientForm.resources****vbc Example.vb /res:PatientForm.resources**

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数实例化从独立.resources 文件中检索资源的对象。The constructor instantiates a object that retrieves resources from a standalone .resources file. 若要从嵌入的.resources 文件中检索资源，请使用构造函数。To retrieve resources from an embedded .resources file, use the constructor. [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-instance-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-instance-note.md)] ## Examples 本部分中的示例使用以下名为的.txt 文件`PatientForm.txt`来定义应用程序使用的资源。The example in this section uses the following .txt file named `PatientForm.txt` to define the resources used by an application. ``` Title="Top Pet Animal Clinic" Label1="Patient Number:" Label2="Pet Name:" Label3="Species:" Label4="Breed:" Label5="Date of Birth:" Label6="Age:" Label7="Owner:" Label8="Address:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Work Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" ``` 您可以通过发出以下命令此.txt 文件编译到.resources 文件：You can compile this .txt file into a .resources file by issuing the following command: **resgen PatientForm.txt****resgen PatientForm.txt** 下面的示例枚举中的资源`PatientForm.resources`并显示名称和每个值。The following example enumerates the resources in `PatientForm.resources` and displays the name and value of each. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/cs/stream2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/vb/stream2.vb#2)]

summary.span: 释放与此 对象相关联的所有操作系统资源。

span.span: Releases all operating system resources associated with this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以安全地调用多次。 can be safely called multiple times. ## Examples 下面的示例经过文件的资源，并显示找到的所有键/值对。The following example moves through a file's resources and displays all the key/value pairs it finds. 然后，代码使用方法以关闭并释放其占用的所有资源。The code then uses the method to shut down the and to release all resources used by it. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example/CPP/getenumerator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example/CS/getenumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResourceReader.GetEnumerator Example/VB/getenumerator.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成后使用的此实例，调用释放此实例使用的所有资源。When you are finished using this instance of , call to release all resources used by this instance. 应避免对此的进一步引用实例，以便垃圾回收器可以回收而不是使其保持活动状态终止实例的内存。You should eliminate further references to this instance so that the garbage collector can reclaim the memory of the instance instead of keeping it alive for finalization. 调用私有 dispose （boolean） 方法，其中包含要释放托管和非托管资源的代码。 calls the private Dispose(Boolean) method, which contains the code to release managed and unmanaged resources. 有关详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator

summary.span: 返回此 对象的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for this object.
An enumerator for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，通过调用枚举资源方法，再重复调用方法返回对象，直到该方法将返回`false`。Typically, you enumerate resources by calling the method and then repeatedly calling the method on the returned object until the method returns `false`. 资源名称是可从属性，其值从属性。The resource name is available from the property; its value from the property. 该示例说明了如何枚举在这种方式中的资源。The example illustrates how to enumerate resources in this way. 实现属性通过类可能会引发以下异常：The implementation of the property by the class can throw the following exceptions: - 找不到包含数据所属的类型的程序集。The assembly that contains the type to which the data belongs cannot be found. - 数据不是预期格式。The data is not in the expected format. - 找不到数据所属的类型。The type to which the data belongs cannot be found. 可以通过调用来处理该异常方法来检索有关数据类型和分配给已命名的资源的字节数组的信息。You can handle the exception by calling the method to retrieve information about the data type and the byte array assigned to the named resource. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"检索资源的名称与 GetResourceData"一节类主题。For more information, see the "Retrieving Resources by Name with GetResourceData" section in the class topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类包括两个方法，返回枚举器。The class includes two methods that return enumerators. 方法将返回接口对象，并建议时要调用的方法枚举资源。The method returns an interface object and is the recommended method to call when enumerating resources. ## Examples 本部分中的示例使用以下名为的.txt 文件`PatientForm.txt`来定义应用程序使用的资源。The example in this section uses the following .txt file named `PatientForm.txt` to define the resources used by an application. ``` Title="Top Pet Animal Clinic" Label1="Patient Number:" Label2="Pet Name:" Label3="Species:" Label4="Breed:" Label5="Date of Birth:" Label6="Age:" Label7="Owner:" Label8="Address:" Label9="Home Phone:" Label10="Work Phone:" Label11="Mobile Phone:" ``` 您可以通过发出以下命令将.txt 文件编译到.resources 文件：You can compile the .txt file into a .resources file by issuing the following command: **resgen PatientForm.txt****resgen PatientForm.txt** 下面的示例枚举中的资源`PatientForm.resources`并显示名称和每个值。The following example enumerates the resources in `PatientForm.resources` and displays the name and value of each. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/cs/stream2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResourceReader.Ctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resourcereader.ctor/vb/stream2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 读取器已关闭或释放，因此无法访问。

span.span: The reader has been closed or disposed, and cannot be accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetResourceData (string resourceName, out string resourceType, out byte[] resourceData);
.method public hidebysig instance void GetResourceData(string resourceName, [out] string& resourceType, [out] unsigned int8[]& resourceData) cil managed
Public Sub GetResourceData (resourceName As String, ByRef resourceType As String, ByRef resourceData As Byte())

public: void GetResourceData(System::String ^ resourceName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % resourceType, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <System::Byte> ^ % resourceData);

span.span: The name of a resource.

param.name: resourceType
param.span: 当此方法返回时，包含表示检索资源的类型名称的字符串。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the type name of the retrieved resource.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

param.name: resourceData
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个字节数组，该字节数组为所检索类型的二进制表示形式。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a byte array that is the binary representation of the retrieved type.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 从打开的资源文件或流检索指定资源的类型名称和数据。

span.span: Retrieves the type name and data of a named resource from an open resource file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索的值作为字节数组的已命名资源。The method retrieves the value of a named resource as a byte array. 它通常是时使用属性尝试检索资源的值时引发异常。It is typically used when the property throws an exception when it tries to retrieve the value of a resource. `resourceType` 是一个字符串，表示资源的数据类型。`resourceType` is a string that represents the data type of the resource. 它可以是以下值之一：It can be any of the following values: - 字符串表示形式`ResourceTypeCode`指示资源的数据类型的枚举成员。The string representation of a `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration member that indicates the data type of the resource. `ResourceTypeCode` 是。 若要使用的专用枚举指示特殊的二进制格式用于存储 19 常见数据类型之一。`ResourceTypeCode` is a private enumeration that is used by .to indicate that a special binary format is used to store one of 19 common data types. 其中包括.NET Framework 基元数据类型 (， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， )，以及， ，并，此外，`ResourceTypeCode`枚举包括下表中显示的值。These include the .NET Framework primitive data types (, , , , , , , , , , , , ), as well as , , and , In addition, the `ResourceTypeCode` enumeration includes the values shown in the following table. |ResourceTypeCode 值ResourceTypeCode value|描述Description| |----------------------------|-----------------| |`ResourceTypeCode.ByteArray`|数据是一个字节数组。The data is a byte array. 这种数据类型通常为调用的结果方法。This data type commonly results from the call to the method.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Null`|数据为 null 引用。The data is a null reference. 这种数据类型通常为调用的结果方法使用一个对象，其值为`null`。This data type commonly results from the call to the method with an object whose value is `null`.| |`ResourceTypeCode.Stream`|数据存储在流中。The data is stored in a stream. 这种数据类型通常为调用的结果或方法。This data type commonly results from the call to the or method.| 假设`resourceData`尚未损坏，它通常可转换从字节数组返回到其原始值通过调用或方法。Assuming that `resourceData` has not been corrupted, it can usually be converted from a byte array back to its original value by calling a or method. - 一个字符串，包含其序列化的数据分配到的类型的完全限定的名称`resourceData`自变量 (例如， `System.String`)。A string that contains the fully qualified name of the type whose serialized data is assigned to the `resourceData` argument (for example, `System.String`). 此外，对于不属于.NET Framework 类库的类型，该字符串包括名称、 版本、 区域性和公钥的包含类型的程序集。In addition, for types that are not part of the .NET Framework class library, the string includes the name, version, culture, and public key of the assembly that contains the type. 例如，以下字符串指示序列化的数据表示的实例`Person`中键入`Extensions`命名空间，在名为具有任何公钥和不指定的区域性的实用工具程序集的版本 1.0 中找到。For example, the following string indicates that the serialized data represents an instance of the `Person` type in the `Extensions` namespace, which is found in version 1.0 of an assembly named Utility that has no public key and no designated culture. `Extensions.Person, Utility, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null` 假设`resourceData`未损坏，以及源类型是否可用，`resourceData`可转换从字节数组返回到其原始值将转换到的字节数组对象并将流传递给方法。Assuming that `resourceData` has not been corrupted and that the source type is available, `resourceData` can be converted from a byte array back to its original value by converting the byte array to a object and passing the stream to the method. - 用于描述中的数据类型的字符串方法调用。The string used to describe the data type in the method call.

does not exist.
has an invalid type.

exception.span: 检索的资源数据已损坏。

span.span: The retrieved resource data is corrupt.

exception.span: 当前 对象未初始化，可能因其已被关闭。

span.span: The current object is not initialized, probably because it is closed.

Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator Implements IEnumerable.GetEnumerator

summary.span: 返回此 对象的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for this object.
An enumerator for this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是显式接口实现。 is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 枚举的.resources 文件中的资源的建议的方法是调用方法对象返回的方法。The recommended approach to enumerating the resources in a .resources file is to call the method of the object returned by the method.

exception.span: 读取器已关闭，并且无法访问。

span.span: The reader has already been closed and cannot be accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed
